Package wiitracker.fingertracking

Interface Summary
FingerListener Interface implemented by anything that listens to a FingerNotifier.
FingerNotifier  
IrCameraNotifier  
 

Class Summary
Finger Wraps Point2D.Double with a point type enumerator.
FingerConverter Marks points reported at 1023, 1023, the default value, as off-screen.
FingerEvent  
FingerLabeler Labels the fingers based on the distance between the points and assumptions about the shape of the hand.
TransformNotifier This singleton class wraps the PerspectiveTransform class for detail hiding and to make it fit in the pipeline.
 

Enum Summary
PointType Contains information accompanying Finger points, including a value, color, and the name of the finger.
